report.title: Wow
report.author: Hollywood
report.bodytext: I sat down and finally smoked two cigarettes of calea mixed with a 'Third-Eye' blend (for relaxation), and had some decent results. I had very vivid and long dreams, and they were quite strange. /n /n Calea-approx. 1.5 grams /n Third-Eye Blend-approx. 2-2.5 grams /n /n I smoked them with my wife, one about 1.5 hours before we went to bed, and the other about a half hour before. I felt very relaxed before hand, and the images were quite abundant when I closed my eyes. /n /n I definitely prefer smoking dream herb instead of drinking the tea, which is down right disgusting even when mixed with camomille, california poppy, and honey.
